fields.name: 6-m7 Frag Grenade
fields.description: Fragmentation grenade type used by western forces. It is lethal in small radius, but it can cause serious injuries at medium ranges.

fields.name: AUR A1
fields.description: A selective fire bullpup weapon. The compact design and the short barrel make the weapon suitable for CQB. It's fed by a dedicated magazine. Uses 5.56x45mm rounds.

fields.name: AUR AX
fields.description: A selective fire bullpup weapon. A modern variant of the AUR A1. The railing on the top and the magazine docking system have been adapted to work with standard western accessories.

fields.name: Barbed Baseball Bat
fields.description: Baseball bat wrapped with barbed wire. It brings a world of hurt to the poor souls on the receiving end. No Exceptions

fields.name: Baseball Bat
fields.description: A wooden baseball bat made for hitting baseballs. Or, if there are none around, any suitable substitute.

fields.name: Bizon
fields.description: Selective-fire submachine gun, fed from an unusual cylindrical magazine. Pistol caliber bullets allow low recoil and long sustained fire. Uses .380 ACP rounds.

fields.name: BK-12
fields.description: An old break-action shotgun, also known as "Spartan". Very effective deterrent against wildlife and other threats. Chambered in 12ga.

fields.name: BK-133
fields.description: Six shot pump action shotgun fed from internal magazine. Good for hunting dangerous game. Uses both 12ga bucks and slugs.

fields.name: BK-18
fields.description: Single shot break action hunting rifle. Designed with simplicity, built to last. Uses 7.62x39mm rounds.

fields.name: BK-43
fields.description: Double-barreled break-action shotgun. Old and reliable design, capable of firing both barrels simultaneously. Uses both 12ga bucks and slugs.

fields.name: Blaze
fields.description: Double-barreled break-action rifle loaded with two .308 WIN rounds.

fields.name: Bone Knife
fields.description: Once sharpened, this bone has revealed itself to be a decent knife.

fields.name: Brass Knuckles
fields.description: Effective hand-to-hand weapon, easily concealed from unattentive enemies. Makes for nasty surprise afterwards.

fields.name: Broom
fields.description: A cleaning tool consisting of stiff fibbers attached to, and roughly parallel to, a cylindrical handle, the broomstick. Mostly used to clean floors, also useful for getting rid of spider webs and scaring away animals.

fields.name: Claymore
fields.description: Directional remote controlled mine. A convenient label reminds the user to point it toward the enemy.

fields.name: Cleaver
fields.description: A big, heavy, sharp knife. Designed to slash through thick raw meat. It can also crack bones easily. Mostly used by butchers.

fields.name: Combat Knife
fields.description: Sharp combat knife with a sturdy blade and a handle. Great for self-defense, but it has other, more mundane uses as well.

fields.name: CR-527
fields.description: A bolt-action hunting rifle, fed from a detachable magazine. It is light and accurate at intermediate ranges. Uses 7.62x39mm rounds.

fields.name: CR-550 Savanna
fields.description: A bolt-action rifle, fed from a detachable magazine. Sturdy and built to last. Uses .308 WIN rounds.

fields.name: CR-61 Skorpion
fields.description: Compact selective-fire submachine gun, fed from a detachable magazine. Often used as a sidearm. Uses .380 ACP rounds.

fields.name: CR-75
fields.description: Semi-automatic pistol, fed from a detachable magazine. Popular due to good quality and affordable price. Uses 9Ã—19mm rounds.

fields.name: Crossbow
fields.description: A type of bow consisting of a horizontal limb, assembly mounted on a stock that can launch projectiles called bolts. It can take down even bigger animals.

fields.name: Crowbar
fields.description: Standard curved crowbar. Read instructions before use. May cause injuries if handled improperly.

fields.name: Crude Machete
fields.description: A quite solid machete with a sharp blade. Although it looks like scrap metal it's a very efficient cutting tool.

fields.name: Deagle
fields.description: Large, semi-automatic pistol, fed from a detachable magazine. Equipped with railed barrel, it hits way above its weight. Uses .357 rounds.

fields.name: Derringer
fields.description: Double-barreled break-action pistol. Combines compact dimensions and powerful ammunition. Uses .357 rounds.
